activity_id.CMIP: CMIP DECK: 1pctCO2, abrupt4xCO2, amip, esm-piControl, esm-historical, historical, and piControl experiments
activity_id.LESFMIP: The Large Ensemble Single Forcing Model Intercomparison Project

1pctCO2.experiment: 1 percent per year increase in CO2

esm-hist.experiment: all-forcing simulation of the recent past with atmospheric CO2 concentration calculated (CO2 emission-driven)

esm-piControl.experiment: pre-industrial control simulation with preindustrial CO2 emissions defined (CO2 emission-driven)

esm-piControl-spinup.description: DECK: spin-up portion of the control (emission-driven)
esm-piControl-spinup.experiment: pre-industrial control simulation with CO2 concentration calculated (spin-up)

fut-Aer.description: As hist-aer but with updated forcings

fut-GHG.description: As hist-GHG but with updated forcings

fut-lu.description: As hist-lu but with updated forcings

fut-sol.description: As hist-sol but with updated forcings

fut-totalO3.description: As hist-totalO3 but with updated forcings

fut-volc.description: As hist-volc but with updated forcings

hist-lu.description: Historical simulations with only land use changes

hist-noLu.description: Same as CMIP6 historical but with land cover held at 1850, no human activity; concentration driven

hist-piAer.description: Historical WMGHG, halocarbon concentrations and O3 precursor emissions, 1850 aerosol precursor emissions.
hist-piAer.experiment: historical forcing, but with pre-industrial aerosol emissions

hist-piGHG.description: Pre-industrial WMGHG, halocarbon and O3 precursor emissions, other forcings as for the historical experiment
hist-piGHG.experiment: historical forcing but with pre-industrial GHG

historical.experiment: all-forcing simulation of the recent past (CO2 concentration-driven)

piControl-spinup.description: DECK: spin-up portion of the control

frequency.1hrCM: monthly-mean diurnal cycle resolving each day into 1-hour means
frequency.1hrPt: sampled hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.3hrPt: sampled 3 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.6hrPt: sampled 6 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.monC: monthly climatology computed from monthly mean samples
frequency.monPt: sampled monthly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.subhrPt: sampled sub-hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.yrPt: sampled yearly, at specified time point within the time period

grid_label.gn: data reported on a model's native grid
grid_label.gna: data reported on a native grid in the region of Antarctica
grid_label.gng: data reported on a native grid in the region of Greenland
grid_label.gnz: zonal mean data reported on a model's native latitude grid
grid_label.gr: regridded data reported on the data provider's preferred target grid
grid_label.gr1: regridded data reported on a grid other than the native grid and other than the preferred target grid
grid_label.gr1a: regridded data reported in the region of Antarctica on a grid other than the native grid and other than the preferred target grid
grid_label.gr1g: regridded data reported in the region of Greenland on a grid other than the native grid and other than the preferred target grid
grid_label.gr1z: regridded zonal mean data reported on a grid other than the native latitude grid and other than the preferred latitude target grid
